original_title: Dead Island 2 Another Day In HELL. A.
overview: Plot: LA is in ruins. A deadly virus is spreading and the city is in quarantine. With the military long gone, follow three fearless survivors in their search for a safe haven from the outbreak and zombie hordes. As they roam the supposedly abandoned mansion of local videogame and movie producer in the Hollywood Hills, theyâ€™ll soon discover that nowhere is safe in HELL.A.
title: Dead Island 2 Another Day In HELL. A.
